Detailed Description

Defines a map of track ID to parent ID and Trajectory.

Note:
This class provides a record of track ancestry which is used to connect track IDs to their parents. It also maps track IDs to Trajectory objects.

Definition at line 27 of file TrackMap.h.

G4VTrajectory * ldmx::TrackMap::findTrajectory ( G4int  trackID)

Find a trajectory by its track ID. If this track ID does not have a trajectory, then the first trajectory found in its parentage is returned.

Parameters:
anEventThe Geant4 event.
trackkIDThe track ID of the trajectory to find.

Definition at line 12 of file TrackMap.cxx.

References trackIDMap_, and trajectoryMap_.

Referenced by ldmx::SimParticleBuilder::findSimParticle().

                                                         {
        G4int currTrackID = trackID;
        G4VTrajectory* traj = nullptr;
        for (;;) {
            traj = trajectoryMap_[currTrackID];
            if (traj) {
                break;
            } else {
                if (trackIDMap_.find(currTrackID) != trackIDMap_.end()) {
                    currTrackID = trackIDMap_[currTrackID];
                } else {
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        return traj;
    }

Get a Trajectory from a track ID.

Returns:
A Trajectory from a track ID.

bool ldmx::TrackMap::hasTrajectory ( G4int  trackID) [inline]

Return true if the given track ID has an explicitly assigned trajectory.

Parameters:
trackIDThe track ID.
Returns:
True if the track ID has an assigned Trajectory.
Note:
This method does not search through the track parentage for the first available Trajectory.
